mapper.select: SELECT block.`blockID`,blockName,post.`postID`,postTitle,user.`userID`,userName, postReplyContent, postDate FROM post JOIN postreply ON post.`postID` = postreply.`postID` JOIN block ON post.`blockID` = block.`blockID` JOIN USER ON post.`userID` = user.`userID` WHERE postTitle LIKE '%${searchField}%' AND postreply.postReplyTime = ( SELECT MIN(postReplyTime) FROM postreply WHERE post.`postID` = postreply.`postID` )
